concept.definition: The item may only be selected one time
The item may be selected multiple times

description: Defines behavior for an action or a group for how many times that item may be repeated
name: OrderSetItemCardinalityBehavior

text.div:
OrderSetItemCardinalityBehavior

Defines behavior for an action or a group for how many times that item may be repeated

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/cardinality-behavior defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
single SingleThe item may only be selected one time
multiple MultipleThe item may be selected multiple times
